Chloe + Chad Face Serum, Unscented  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Chloe + Chad

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Camellia Sinensis Leaf Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) oil*, Argania spinosa (argan) Oil*, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Daucus Carotas (carrot seed oil)

Directions: Apply a few drops of face serum to fingers and massage into face. In the morning, as a base for your regular moisturizer and at night as a stand alone moisturizer. For best results use our hibiscus toner before moisturizing.
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
